deck:
You can view the video mentioned in the talk at youtu.be/UE9UvT5ujyg.

The most efficient way to donate is directly to Gateway Church. We can claim Gift Aid and will assign your whole gift to this project. If you can't give directly to Gateway Church, you can donate at www.give.net/100daysofkindness (give.net take a small admin fee for each donation).
subtitle: Caleb introduces our Christmas Kindness Project with Charity: Water, part of our 100 Days of Kindness
title: Christmas Kindness Project
